FAQ
---

*   [How long will it take to set up?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-1)
*   [How does ShareFile secure my files?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-2)
*   [What’s the difference between a client user and an employee user?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-3)
*   [How does ShareFile streamline work with email, search and sync?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-4)
*   [How does encrypted email work?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-5)
*   [Can I send files for e-signature from ShareFile?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-6)

#### [How long will it take to set up?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-1)

ShareFile is easy to set up and easy to use. Everything is in the cloud, so there are no downloads or installs, for you or your users. On-premises or hybrid storage solutions are available with our Enterprise plans.

#### [How does ShareFile secure my files?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-2)

ShareFile safeguards your documents with industry-accepted encryption protocols and algorithms in transit and at rest. Your files are encrypted with up to 256-bit encryption using industry-standard encryption protocols.

#### [What’s the difference between a client user and an employee user?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-3)

Think of employee users as internal users who work for your company and client users as external users. Employee users manage the account and can request and send files to client users. Client users are able to upload and download files, along with a few others capabilities. All ShareFile plans have unlimited client users.

#### [How does ShareFile streamline work with email, search and sync?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-4)

ShareFile for Mac or Windows allows users to access files directly through a mapped drive, providing a native file storage experience. ShareFile for Outlook and Google Workspace allows users to insert links to files, upload and send new files, and request files directly from Microsoft Outlook or Gmail email messages.

#### [How does encrypted email work?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-5)

ShareFile allows you to encrypt not just email attachments, but also the body of your message to your recipient. It’s a simpler way to support compliance and add security. And even better: Recipients don’t need to be ShareFile customers or have a username and password to view or respond to an encrypted email.

#### [Can I send files for e-signature from ShareFile?](https://www.sharefile.com/pricing#1067240601-389406488-6)

The ShareFile Premium plans includes integrated electronic signature at no extra cost. With integrated e-signature, you can send files stored in your ShareFile account quickly for secure, legally binding e-signatures. Signed documents are saved automatically back to ShareFile, making the process seamless.

      ![Image 12](https://sharefile.widen.net/content/fa538f29-5ab2-4463-b6a5-a02516d878e1/web/Website_3D_Stills_ShareFile_PROD_Stills_03_StructuredTowers_V005_JS__CC_V002_RS.jpg?crop=yes&k=c&w=480&h=480&itok=GAeU9WxB)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

### Your Privacy

#### Your Privacy

When you visit any web site, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalised web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://www.progress.com/legal/privacy-center)

*   ### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    #### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    Always Active
    
     Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Performance Cookies
    
    #### Performance Cookies
    
     Performance Cookies
    
    These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Functional Cookies
    
    #### Functional Cookies
    
     Functional Cookies
    
    These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Targeting Cookies
    
    #### Targeting Cookies
    
     Targeting Cookies
    
    These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
    
    Cookies Details‎

FAQ
---

*   [How long will it take to set up?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-1)
*   [How does ShareFile secure my files?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-2)
*   [What’s the difference between a client user and an employee user?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-3)
*   [How does ShareFile streamline work with email, search and sync?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-4)
*   [How does encrypted email work?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-5)
*   [Can I send files for e-signature from ShareFile?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-6)

#### [How long will it take to set up?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-1)

ShareFile is easy to set up and easy to use. Everything is in the cloud, so there are no downloads or installs, for you or your users. On-premises or hybrid storage solutions are available with our Enterprise plans.

#### [How does ShareFile secure my files?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-2)

ShareFile safeguards your documents with industry-accepted encryption protocols and algorithms in transit and at rest. Your files are encrypted with up to 256-bit encryption using industry-standard encryption protocols.

#### [What’s the difference between a client user and an employee user?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-3)

Think of employee users as internal users who work for your company and client users as external users. Employee users manage the account and can request and send files to client users. Client users are able to upload and download files, along with a few others capabilities. All ShareFile plans have unlimited client users.

#### [How does ShareFile streamline work with email, search and sync?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-4)

ShareFile for Mac or Windows allows users to access files directly through a mapped drive, providing a native file storage experience. ShareFile for Outlook and Google Workspace allows users to insert links to files, upload and send new files, and request files directly from Microsoft Outlook or Gmail email messages.

#### [How does encrypted email work?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-5)

ShareFile allows you to encrypt not just email attachments, but also the body of your message to your recipient. It’s a simpler way to support compliance and add security. And even better: Recipients don’t need to be ShareFile customers or have a username and password to view or respond to an encrypted email.

#### [Can I send files for e-signature from ShareFile?](https://www.sharefile.com/plans-pricing#1067240601-389406488-6)

The ShareFile Premium plans includes integrated electronic signature at no extra cost. With integrated e-signature, you can send files stored in your ShareFile account quickly for secure, legally binding e-signatures. Signed documents are saved automatically back to ShareFile, making the process seamless.

### Your Privacy

#### Your Privacy

When you visit any web site, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalised web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://www.progress.com/legal/privacy-center)

*   ### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    #### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    Always Active
    
     Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Performance Cookies
    
    #### Performance Cookies
    
     Performance Cookies
    
    These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Functional Cookies
    
    #### Functional Cookies
    
     Functional Cookies
    
    These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Targeting Cookies
    
    #### Targeting Cookies
    
     Targeting Cookies
    
    These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
    
    Cookies Details‎
